body_html:
@michaelisard I am not sure, maybe it's the same problem.
In my context, all memory of gpu 2 has been used, when I run tensorflow program, specifically, the calling of tf.Session.run(), it try to check all gpus on my machine, but the fact is that 4768MiB / 4799MiB memory of gpu 2 has been used, the memory is not enough to run other's thread.

In the #152, the output of nvidia-smi says that there is enough memory.
